roles.note: This frame differs from its verbal counterpart in its inclusion of arg3, beneficiary. This is part of the VN structure though. (from model.01-n)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: In the early 1970s , Mr. Smith modeled his fledgling company on Tiger 's innovation of hub-and-spoke and containerized-cargo operations .
example.arg: on Tiger 's innovation of hub-and-spoke and containerized-cargo operations

example.name: without Arg2
example.text: `` It [*EXP*-1] 's very difficult [*]to model the long-term impact of this , '' says [*T*-3] Andrew Goldberg , who [*T*-2] studies the public-policy and crisis-management aspects of earthquakes at the Center for Strategic International Studies in Washington , D.C .

example.name: with arg1
example.text: a working model of a `` picocassette ''recorder .

example.name: arg 0
example.text: there are so few countries which are organized on the American model with its , the powers of the state
a mouse model of Alzheimer 's similar to the human disease , complete with memory and learning impairment
example.arg: of Alzheimer's similar to the human disease , complete with memory and learning impairment

example.name: with material as manner
example.text: A key issue in disscussion of " life " and " universes " is what constitutes " structure " or " order " . For example , to take BGW 's -LRB- and Capra 's -RRB- fractal model of embedded " structures " we are still left with the regression problem of " who observes / defines such structure " .

roleset.name: to work as a fashion model
roleset.note: MODEL-V NOTES: Member of Vncls captain-29.8-1 (from model.02-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [*] Consider Gap Inc. , whose latest ad campaign [*T*-1]features black-and-white shots of Hollywood stars , artists and other well-known personalities modeling the retailer 's jeans and T-shirts .
example.arg: Hollywood stars , artists and other well-known personalities
